button.usb_hint: Plug in and unlock your device
button.bluetooth_hint: Power on and unlock your device

continueOnLedger.title: Continue on your
continueOnLedger.description: Follow the instructions displayed on your Ledger device.

pin.title: Enter your PIN
pin.description: Enter your PIN to unlock your Ledger device.

signTransaction.title: Sign transaction
signTransaction.description: Follow the instructions displayed on your Ledger device.

ledgerSync.turnOnLedgerSyncTitle: Turn on Ledger Sync to continue
ledgerSync.turnOnLedgerSyncSubtitle: This is required to be able to fetch you accounts securely. By clicking Turn on Ledger Sync you’ll be redirected to Ledger Live to activate the feature.
ledgerSync.activateSelectPlatform: Select how you want to activate Ledger Sync
ledgerSync.activateStep1Desktop: 1. Click on the link below to activate Ledger Sync
ledgerSync.activateStep1DesktopLLInstalled: Make sure Ledger Live is installed on your computer.
ledgerSync.activateStep1Mobile: 1. Scan the QR code with your mobile phone and follow instruction
ledgerSync.activateStep2: 2. Once Ledger Sync is activated you can continue by clicking the link below

turnOnSync.subtitle: Turn on Ledger Sync to continue
turnOnSync.text: This is required to be able to fetch you accounts securely. By clicking Turn on Ledger Sync you’ll be redirected to Ledger Live to activate the feature.

accountTokens.title: Account Tokens
accountTokens.noTokens: No tokens found for this account

success.title: Transaction signed
success.description: You transaction will be processed soon.

error.title: Transaction failed
error.description: There was an error signing your transaction. Please try again.

account.title: An error occurred
account.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching your accounts. Please try again

sign.title: An error occurred
sign.description: An unexpected error occurred while signing your transaction. Please try again

DeviceNotSupported.title: {device} isn't supported
DeviceNotSupported.description: The {device} isn't supported for the Ledger Direct connectivity on this Dapp
DeviceNotSupported.cta2: Upgrade to a new Ledger Device with 20% off

IncorrectSeed.title: Incorrect device
IncorrectSeed.description: This {device} does not match the selected account: {account}. Please connect the correct Ledger device

BlindSigningDisabled.title: Blind signing disabled
BlindSigningDisabled.description: This transaction can not be clear signed, enable blind signing in the application settings

UserRejectedTransaction.title: Transaction rejected
UserRejectedTransaction.description: You have rejected the transaction on your {device}

ConnectionFailed.title: Unable to activate Ledger Sync
ConnectionFailed.description: The connection to Ledger Live to activate Ledger Sync is failing. Please close this tab, open the Ledger Live app (Desktop or Mobile), activate Ledger Sync and reopen the tab

NoCompatibleAccounts.title: No compatible account found
NoCompatibleAccounts.description: This Dapp is supporting the following networks {networks}, for which you don't have any accounts. Please create a new account on Ledger Live
NoCompatibleAccounts.cta1: Create a new account on Ledger Live

NoAccountInSync.title: No accounts in sync
NoAccountInSync.description: Ledger Sync is activated but no accounts are in sync. Please activate Ledger Sync on Ledger Live and add one or more accounts.

BroadcastTransactionError.title: Transaction failed
BroadcastTransactionError.description: Your transaction was sent to the network but failed to execute.

DeviceDisconnected.title: Ledger Device disconnected
DeviceDisconnected.descriptionUsb: The connection to your Ledger {device} has been lost. Plug your Device and unlock it.
DeviceDisconnected.descriptionBluetooth: The connection to your Ledger {device} has been lost. Unlock it and make sure it is nearby.
DeviceDisconnected.descriptionGeneric: The connection to your Ledger {device} has been lost. If you are using USB, plug your Device and unlock it. If you are using Bluetooth, unlock it and make sure it is nearby.
